actions.name: Wimp Out

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an attack that reduces their HP to 50% their Max HP or lower.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an attack that reduces their HP to 50% their Max HP or lower.
Effect: The user freely moves up to half their Movement Score away from the attacking creature. If the user is an owned Pokemon, they may Switch out from battle as a Free Action, allowing their trainer to Switch In a replacement as a Free Action.
